example.name: preempt
example.text: Well eh I would -- [I]-1 would n't like *PRO*-1 to eh preempt or influence the trial because this is -- uh this is independent judicial uh process and I would not like *PRO*-2 to to uh uh apply any pressure *ICH*-3 on the judge uh *PRO* to uh speed up the trial trial.
